0.text: Bug 6064  Open on selection shouldn't require selection.

1.text: Build 20011116  - move the text insertion point into the middle of a type name in a Java editor - press F3 - it has no effect  It would be better if it opened on the current word.

2.text: (I notice that it currently works for a partial selection, if the selection  includes the start of the type name, as if it's doing code-assist or something.)

3.text: This is an issue for keyboard accessibility.

4.text: It currently requires you to move  the cursor to the start of the word, hit CTRL+SHIFT+RIGHT to select the word,  then F3.

5.text: It would be better if you could just move to the word and hit F3.
